name: Interactive Dungeon Map for TV-Tables
description:
i built a table tv and wanted something a little more dynamic to use with it.. so i literally just bashed this together in a couple afternoons using ue4 so that my forever DM could take a break for a session and jump into a one shot.

i really just made this for my friends to play but figured i would share it... its only a small dungeon just for testing purposes, i ripped the map from SavingThrower on deviantart (Biggups!)...

just right click to get rid of the 3d enemies and replace with physical minis for whatever encounter you brew up.

i plan to make something much bigger and throw in an actual physics based dice roll mechanic as well... but i will probably take some time between university and other commitments.
